scripts.clean: yarn clean:bitcoin-otc && yarn clean:twitter && yarn clean:twitch
scripts.clean:bitcoin-otc: find bitcoin-otc -type f -name '*.csv' ! -name 'source.csv' -delete && find bitcoin-otc -type f -name '*.out' -delete
scripts.clean:twitter: find twitter -type f -name '*.csv' ! -name 'source.csv' -delete && find twitter -type f -name '*.out' -delete
scripts.clean:twitch: find twitch -type f -name '*.csv' ! -name 'source.csv' -delete && find twitch -type f -name '*.out' -delete
